extendedInfo.description: Daily deals (Or Flash sells, deal of the day) are local deals that usually sell for days if not hours. They offer large discount, often times half price. DealLeak collects great daily deals into one site from Groupon, Living Social, Plum District, kgb Deals, EverSave, Tippr, HomeRun, BuyWithMe, Zozi, BloomSpot, DailyDealster, HalfOffDepot, YourBestDeals, iCouponOnline, MamaPedia, TownHog, CrowdSavings, DealOn, WowWhatSavings, AdPages, TravelZoo, Gilt City, SpecialDeals, adPages, Scoop St., DealPulp, PetSimply, Daily Pride, Zulily, Juice in the city, LiveCheapr, Spott, DealFind, Saveology, Groupigg and many others. - 51 Excellent Personal Finance Android Apps (The Biz-learner)- 100 Android Apps You Can't Live Without (MaximumTech)- Top free daily deal apps for Android (WorldAndroid.com)Only the deals near your city are displayed. You can set the search criteria like zip code and search distance. You can also choose to see only new deals or expiring deals. Bottom line is, you'll only see the deals that are relevant and interesting to you.You can easily share daily deals in Facebook, Twitter or email.Tired of searching daily deal sites from search engines? Dealleak is the perfect solution. Shopping deals on mobile app is much more convenient than on daily deal websites like yipit, groupon or dealradar.

reviews.title: Better than Nothing, Barely
reviews.comment: 1)  When compiling deals across sites, it often (usually?) pulls in wrong areas and wrong expiration times.   2) It doesn\'t allow resorting of deals in your wallet so that you can watch expiration dates,  for instance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use to be better
reviews.comment: This app use to find a lot more deals.   Seems lately it misses a lot of sites and deals.
reviews.author: Eric Springer

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Tried and tried to make it work but it never gave ner any results.   Got nothing but the \"loading\" screen while waiting.  But the ads kept updating and changing, so I had a connection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing too many offers
reviews.comment: There are many offers found in Groupon and Travelzoo which do not show up in this app. Pointless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So, So. 2 stars
reviews.comment: Very few great deals but a lot of crappy cheap quality, as seen on tv, kinda stuff too. Not worth it. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Nothing shows up
reviews.author: Anthony Rocco

reviews.comment: Sucks
reviews.author: Sally Marmolejo

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!!
reviews.comment: This app has all the deals in one. Saves tons of time and money!! 5 stars all the way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very useful with ability to search
reviews.comment: Great idea for an app hindered by a lack of search. Currently have to scroll through huge long lists of deals to find one you like. Adding search would make the app useful for more than curious browsing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea, mediocre execution.
reviews.comment: Slow clunky UI. Some deals have no info or area on the main deal list, so u have 2 click on them 2 find out anything at all. I still use the groupon app bc it offers much more functionality w using groupons & now deals, so I try to check off groupon in the deal provider list so I don\'t have to scroll past a ton of groupons I\'ve already seen, but no matter how many times I do this they keep coming up - so annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: All the deals from different places in one. No need to look elsewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: covers a lot
reviews.comment: No need to go back and forth between daily deal sites or apps. Dealleak brings it all to you. Good deals from sites you\'ve never heard of.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: All the deals from all those coupon sites in one app.

reviews.title: Awesome app!

reviews.title: Great service!
reviews.comment: it really aggregates all deals from a  variety of trustworthy sources such as living social and groupon

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Excellent aggregation program. Could use features to remember filter settings, providers, etc between invocations

reviews.comment: AWESOME! !!
